name: unpressed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unpressed clothes have not been ironed (= made flat and smooth using a piece of equipment called an iron, that has a handle and a flat base and is usually heated with electricity): His shirt was clean, but unpressed. Synonym
unironed
An unpressed cheese does not have something heavy put on it during preparation to make it firm or to form it into a shape: Saint-Marcellin is an uncooked and unpressed cheese from the Isère Valley.
More examplesFewer examplesI started noticing the unpressed linen, scuffed menus, and the dirty floor.Unpressed pleats fall from a shaped waistband, elasticated at the sides. She started making and selling a distinctive unpressed cheese at local markets.Some goats' milk cheeses are lightly pressed and then rolled in herbs, while others are soft, unpressed cheeses.
